alert.note: Alert for Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 3:54AM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow and moderate to strong winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches with western slopes of Sawtooths accumulations up to 15 inches. Winds gusting 40 to 55 mph. * WHERE...Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, and Galena Pass. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
